page.title: 10A Day With Rebecca Aged 9
page.content: I got up at 8.15am, washed, dressed and had my breakfast. I went to school in the car with my Mum and Dad. I went into the classroom and took the packed lunches into the kitchen and then turned the music on in the Hall ready for Assembly. In Science we wrote about our runner bean. During playtime I played chitty backs with Nicola. After play we did Maths until 12.00am. After lunch we worked until 2.00 pm and then went swimming in the school pool. After school I walked home with Nicola. I had my tea at 6.00pm and after tea I played on the computer with Daddy. Then I got ready for bed, had a drink, cleaned my teeth and went to bed.
